title: Can we make intention to fast Arafah or Ashoora after the adhan / athan of Fajr? - assim al hakeem
transcript: [Music] uh can we fast Ashura or arafah and make the intention after the Fajr the answer is such days that are highly recommended cannot be attained unless you make the intention before Fajr like Oaths like Ramadan like making up of Ramadan like expiations these have to be made before Fajr and to get and attain the full reward of Ashura and arafah the same has to be done with that and Allah Knows Best
